ygData.subject: Why was total-bandwidth-usage-KB-sec removed from H3
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all. I m busy migrating a bunch of Heritrix 1 templates to H3. And noticed in the process that the setting total-bandwidth-usage-KB-sec has been removed

Hi all.
I'm busy migrating a bunch of Heritrix 1 templates to H3.
And notic=
ed in the process that the setting "total-bandwidth-usage-KB-sec" has been =
removed
from H3.

What was the rationale behind that decision?


Best Regar=
ds
S=F8ren Vejrup Carlsen, Developer of Netarchivesuite.

--_000_C4C76BFAD99C1E41A39A14996ED46BEA015C4A79B0EXCHANGE02kbd_
